com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly
Class CustomFullscreenOverlay<T extends AdaptorCustomFullscreen & IActivityLifeCycleAware>

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.OverlayContainer<T>
      com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.CustomFullscreenOverlay<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
View.OnClickListener, IOverlayContainer, IActivityLifeCycleAware, Runnable
public class CustomFullscreenOverlay<T extends AdaptorCustomFullscreen & IActivityLifeCycleAware>
extends OverlayContainer<T>
implements View.OnClickListener, Runnable

Custom fullscreen implmentation. Allows to display custom views as an interstitial ads.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
